protocol.name: P-GSE60242-1
protocol.text: The data was analyzed with Microarray Suite version 5.0 (MAS 5.0) using "affy" package (v1.32.1). ID_REF =  VALUE = MAS5.0 signal intensity ABS_CALL = indicating whether the transcript was present (P), absent (A), or marginal (M) DETECTION P-VALUE = p-value that indicates the significance level of the detection call

protocol.name: P-GSE60242-2
protocol.text: Ovules including embryos from 2-16 cell stage were dissected from siliques and fixed with 0.1% PFA (paraformaldeyhde).

protocol.name: P-GSE60242-3
protocol.text: Long day 16 hours light/8 hours dark.

protocol.name: P-GSE60242-4
protocol.text: Nuclear extraction with CelLyticTM PN kit (Sigma). RNA extraction with buffer containing proteinase K.

protocol.name: P-GSE60242-5
protocol.text: Biotinylated cRNA was prepared according to the ENZO BioArrayâ„¢ Single-round RNA amplification and biotin labeling system.

protocol.name: P-GSE60242-6
protocol.text: Following fragmentation, 12.5 ug of cRNA were hybridized for 16 hr at 45C on ATH1 array. GeneChips were washed and stained in the Affymetrix Fluidics Station 450.

protocol.name: P-GSE60242-7
protocol.text: GeneChips were scanned using Affymetrix GeneChip scanner 3000.
